plot outline: This is a story of an orphaned child who is abducted from love and affection. During his childhood Kesto lost his parents and came to his step sister's house. Nabin, his brother-in-law, was a selfish person who cared for his profit neglecting the villagers well-being. Where as his brother Bipin was kind from his heart and always thinks about the benefit of villagers.
title: Mej Didi
plot: Kesto lost his parents and comes to his step-sister's house.

This is a story of an orphaned child who is abducted from love and affection. During his childhood Kesto lost his parents and came to his step sister's house. Nabin, his brother-in-law, was a selfish person who cared for his profit neglecting the villagers well-being. Where as his brother Bipin was kind from his heart and always thinks about the benefit of villagers.::Swarup Basak
